statements: UPDATE shared_documents SET contributor_name = 'Alice' WHERE document_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
UPDATE shared_documents SET file_location = '/documents/file1.pdf', document_name = 'Financial Report' WHERE document_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-0987654321abc';
UPDATE shared_documents SET file_location = '/path/to/new/file' WHERE document_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
UPDATE shared_documents SET contributor_name = 'Alice Smith', upload_timestamp = '2022-01-15 14:30:00' WHERE document_name = 'Presentation';
UPDATE Documents SET document_name = 'New Document Name', created_at = '2022-01-01' WHERE document_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE Collaborators SET collaborator_email = 'newemail@example.com', collaborator_role = 'Editor' WHERE collaborator_id = '98765432-1111-2222-3333-444444444444'
UPDATE Documents SET document_name = 'New Document Name' WHERE document_id = 'f1578e20-9d89-4b99-810d-4beafb037a0c';
UPDATE Collaborators SET collaborator_role = 'Editor', collaborator_email = 'editor@example.com' WHERE collaborator_id = '2a1f16db-32a8-483d-b77f-adf1a8293f95';
UPDATE shared_documents SET document_name = 'Updated Document Name', collaborators = '{"user1", "user2"}' WHERE document_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE files SET uploader = 'New Uploader', permissions = '{"read", "write"}' WHERE file_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE shared_documents SET document_name = 'Updated Document Name', author = 'New Author', creation_date = '2022-05-20 10:00:00', document_content = 'Updated Document Content', collaborators = '[{"user": "User1", "permissions": ["read", "write"]}, {"user": "User2", "permissions": ["read"]}]' WHERE document_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE files SET file_name = 'New File Name', file_type = 'PDF', uploader = 'Uploader123', upload_date = '2022-06-15 08:30:00', file_content = 'Updated File Content', permissions = '[{"user": "UserA", "access_level": "admin"}, {"user": "UserB", "access_level": "read-only"}]' WHERE file_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE shared_documents SET author='John Doe' WHERE id=1
UPDATE presentations SET presenter='Alice Smith', presentation_name='Sales Pitch' WHERE id=3
UPDATE shared_documents SET document_name = 'Updated Document 1', author = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE presentations SET presenter = 'Jane Smith', presentation_name = 'Updated Presentation' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Users SET role='Admin' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE Documents SET document_name='Updated Document' WHERE document_id=2;
UPDATE Documents SET document_name = 'Updated Document Name', created_by = 'John Doe' WHERE document_id = 1;
UPDATE Files SET uploaded_at = '2022-10-20', uploaded_by = 'Jane Smith' WHERE file_id = 3;
